name: Raising Your Army
description: Learn how to commission military platoons to defend your empire and conquer new worlds.

story.briefing: Commander, an empire without soldiers is an empire waiting to fall. Your planets can provide troops, and with the right equipment, they become a formidable fighting force. Today you will commission your first platoon.
story.objective: Commission one platoon with 100 troops, Standard equipment, and Rifle weapons.
story.victory: Excellent work, Commander! Your first platoon stands ready. Remember: troop count affects size, equipment affects survivability, and weapons affect damage. Balance these to build the army you need.

tutorialSteps.text: Commander, it's time to raise your first military unit. Click on your home planet to open the Planet Info panel.
See the 'Commission' button? This opens the Platoon Commission panel where you configure your new unit. Click it now.
The Platoon Commission panel shows your configuration options. First, set the troop count - this determines your platoon's size. Click '100' to set 100 troops.
Equipment level affects your soldiers' armor and survival rate. Basic is cheap, Advanced is expensive but durable. Click 'Standard' for balanced protection.
Weapon level determines damage output. Pistols are weak, Plasma is devastating. Click 'Rifle' for good all-around firepower.
Review the Total Cost and Estimated Strength. Your configuration costs credits from this planet's treasury. The strength preview shows combat effectiveness.
Everything looks good! Click 'COMMISSION PLATOON' to create your unit. The troops will be recruited from this planet's population.

clickByClickRecipe.title: Platoon Commissioning - Step by Step

steps.instruction: Click your home planet to open the Planet Info panel
steps.expectedResult: Planet Info panel opens showing planet details

steps.instruction: Click the 'Commission' button in the Planet Info panel
Click the '100' button to set 100 troops
Check the Total Cost and Estimated Strength values
steps.expectedResult: Cost shows credits, strength shows combat value
Platoon is created, panel closes, population reduced

notes: Troops are recruited from the planet's population
Each planet can have up to 24 platoons
Weapons: Pistol < Rifle < Assault Rifle < Plasma
